title: India's decade will be SBI's decade, too...as the best, most valued bank: Challa Sreenivasulu Setty, Chairman
description: Challa Sreenivasulu Setty, the new chairman of State Bank of India, is aiming to leverage the bank's extensive network and brand to attract more deposits while managing risks in infrastructure financing. He emphasises technology, customer service, and cyber security as key priorities to enhance productivity and maintain consistent performance.
